title: ivy-fail goal directs people to non-existant page
description:
The ivy-fail goal suggests going to http://wiki.apache.org/lucene-java/HowToContribute#antivy which doesn't have a section on ant/ivy anymore.

The last revision to have this was #41, in 2013.

http://wiki.apache.org/lucene-java/HowToContribute?action=recall&rev=41

comments.content:
I signed up for a wiki account (mdrob), but don't see any place to comment or edit. Are the wiki pages kept in SVN somewhere? Do I need to request karma and make changes directly? The change I would make is adding the following bullet:


	if you installed ant from distribution packages (yum, apt, etc...) then try installing ivy from the same.

comments.content:

I added you to the lucene-java wiki ContributorsGroup page (note though that the Solr wiki has a separate authentication database, so if/when you want access there you'll need to do the same again), which allows you to make edits.
